name: Mad Xmas (Remake)
description:
(This is my first time uploading a game to somewhere that isn't Scratch, so it might suck a little)

A remake of dreamGEAR's "Mad Xmas" game that I made in TurboWarp because... idk, boredom I guess.
... Not much else to say about this...

(downloadable version for Windows also available)

~~ CONTROLS ~~

WASD (or Arrow Keys, in 1P Mode (if you're a loser) - Move Player 1 (the green guy)

Arrow Keys - Move Player 2 (the red guy)

WASD/Arrow Keys+Space - Navigate Menus

(also I know it's not Christmas yet, SHUT UP.)
